Account Onboarding.eligibility_criteria: 21-60 years, Indian citizen, minimum ₹25,000 monthly income, CIBIL score > 700
Account Onboarding.required_documents: Aadhaar Card, PAN Card, 3 months bank statements, cancelled cheque, selfie with PAN
Account Onboarding.application_process: Apply via app → Upload documents → Video KYC → Instant approval or 24hr verification
Account Onboarding.verification_timeline: Video KYC: Instant | Document verification: 24 hours | Rejection notice within 48 hours
Account Onboarding.kyc_process: Download app → Complete video KYC (2 mins) → Selfie verification → Account activated instantly
Account Onboarding.income_proof: Salary slips (3 months), Form 16, or bank statements showing regular credits
Account Onboarding.rejection_reasons: Low CIBIL (<700), insufficient income proof, incomplete documents, blacklisted in CIBIL

Card Delivery.standard_delivery: 3-5 business days across India (metro: 2-3 days, Tier 2/3: 4-5 days)

Card Delivery.expedited_delivery: ₹499 extra → Next day delivery (metro only) | Request within 24hrs of order
Card Delivery.change_address: Update address in Profile → Delivery → Confirm OTP → New delivery in 2-3 days
Card Delivery.card_arrival: Card arrives in tamper-proof envelope. Activate via app/scratch PIN on back
Card Delivery.pickup_option: Available at 500+ partner stores (Reliance Retail, Croma). Show OTP + ID proof
Card Delivery.delivery_failed: Redeliver within 48hrs or convert to pickup. Contact support if >3 failed attempts
